name: Cordell Reagon
description: '''Cordell Hull Reagon''' (February 22, 1943 â€“ November 12, 1996) was an American singer and activist. He was the founding member of [[The Freedom Singers]] of the [[Student Nonviolent Coordinating Committee]] (SNCC), a leader of the [[Albany Movement]] and a [[Freedom Riders|Freedom Rider]] during the [[Civil Rights Movement]].
